summary: PURCHASED 2001 ACURAL 3.2CL S-TYPE WITH 32K MILES.  AT 38K MILES, CAR BEGAN TO SLIP IN 3RD GEAR.  TRANSMISSION WOULD COMPLETELY DISENGAGE IN 3RD, AND I WOULD HAVE TO SHIFT IT TO ADJACENT GEAR TO RE-ENGAGE TRANSMISSION.  OVER THE COURSE OF THE NEXT WEEK, SLIPPING BECAME INCREASINGLY MORE FREQUENT.  I HAVE READ MANY SIMILAR SUCH COMPLAINTS, AND I AM SERIOUSLY CONCERNED ABOUT THE RELIABILITY OF THE CL TRANSMISSION.
